recipe.title: Basil Lemon Syrup
ingredients: 4 cups packed fresh basil sprigs (top 4 inches; from a 1/2-pound bunch)
instructions: Bring all ingredients to a boil in a medium saucepan, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Let stand at room temperature, covered, 1 hour, then transfer to an airtight container and chill until cold, about 1 hour. Strain syrup thourough a sieve into a bowl, pressing hard on and then discarding solids.
